text: 7.12: Mt 22.39-40 naŋga, Lu 6.31 naŋga, Ro 13.8-10 naŋga, Ga 5.14 naŋga, 1 Ti 1.5Muhɨmɨmuhɨm vana narɨŋ kru muŋɨnɨŋ andɨmu vata pɨrɨ tamɨrɨmandɨra ha, sɨhwɨmaña musa kru muŋɨnɨŋ ndahara andɨmara. Kanɨmata vana nɨŋandɨhin Gotɨndu tɨkatɨka kuyundu kuyu sapa. Naŋga kru Gotɨndu kuyu mɨŋata ambavaravara haŋɨnɨŋɨndu kuyuyɨndu kuyu sapa, vami.
